allTours.title: Introduction to NFIs
allTours.description: Use NFIs to access OS specific functionality, specifically Android Device Settings.
allTours.details:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar.

 Learn how to:

  • Configure the Android Native Function APIs required to access Device settings on Android device from an app using Volt MX Iris.
  • Add code in the Form controller to access Device Settings

allTours.title: NFIs Using Third-party Library
allTours.description: Use NFIs to access third-party libraries, specifically Android barcode scanner.
allTours.details:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar.

Learn how to:

  • Import a Collection library to an app and use it in a form
  • Configure the Native Function APIs required for barcode scanner for an Android app
  • Add code in the Form controller for the barcode scanning functionality

allTours.title: Understand Identity Services
allTours.description: Add authentication to your app.
allTours.details:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar.

 Learn how to:

  • Secure your application by using an authentication mechanism.

allTours.title: Add a Salesforce Service
allTours.description: Learn how to add a Salesforce service to your app.
allTours.details:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar.

 Learn how to:

  • Configure a service that communicates with an external data source by using a Salesforce data connector.

allTours.title: Add an Authentication Source
allTours.description: Add Volt MX User Repository to your app to authorize users.
allTours.details:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar.

 Learn how to:

  • Add Volt MX User Repository as an authentication source
  • Add users to the repository
  • Access app using the login credentials from the Volt MX User Repository

allTours.title: Use Sample Services
allTours.description: Connect a sample back-end database to a form
allTours.details:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar.

 Learn how to:

  • Create a form
  • Connect to a sample back-end database
  • Add data to the form. You can follow the same steps to bind your own back-end data to your app.

allTours.title: Use Storage Services
allTours.description: Create a storage service, populate, and connect the data to the form.
allTours.details:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar.

 Learn how to:

  • Create a form
  • Create a storage service
  • Populate data in the storage service
  • Connect data to the form

allTours.title: Launch your Responsive Web App
allTours.description: Launch your Responsive Web App
allTours.details:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar: 

  

Learn how to: 

  • Import a sample web app that shows lists of Accounts and Recipients
  • Preview the sample app on your computer using Live Preview

allTours.details:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar: 

  

Learn how to: 

  • Create Responsive Web forms with UI elements for user interaction
  • Add navigation to access the different forms of the app

allTours.title: Responsive Web Breakpoints

allTours.details:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar: 

  

Learn how to: 

  • Add three breakpoints for the forms Create Recipient and Edit Recipient screens.
  • See how the Live Preview reacts to breakpoints in real-time.

allTours.title: Volt MX Orientation
allTours.description: Learn about the Volt MX Iris features
allTours.details:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar.

Get a brief understanding of the Volt MX Iris features and their functionality.

allTours.title: Introduction to Flex Layout
allTours.description: Learn about Flex layout properties.
allTours.details:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar.

For a FlexContainer widget, learn how to:

  • Define widget arrangement
  • Modify free form attributes
  • Add logo and header widgets

allTours.title: Flex Layout Properties
allTours.description: Manage flex layout using properties.
allTours.details:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar.

 Learn how to:

  • Set properties to a Button widget
  • Align a button across the X and Y axis
  • Explore the zIndex property

allTours.title: Introduction to Segment
allTours.description: Learn the basics of the Segment widget.
allTours.details:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar.

 Learn how to:

  • Create a FlexForm with a Segment widget
  • Add widgets to a Segment widget
  • Assign sample data to a Segment widget

allTours.title: Assign Data to Segment
allTours.description: Learn how to assign data to a Segment widget.
allTours.details:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar.

 Learn how to:

  • Change the UI and add new widgets to a Segment widget
  • Bind back-end services to the UI elements in a Segment

allTours.title: Introduction to Segment Templates
allTours.description: Know more about using Segment Templates.
allTours.details:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar.

 Learn how to:

  • Convert a row in a Segment into a template.
  • Add sample data to widgets in a Segment using template.

allTours.title: Introduction to Action Editor
allTours.description: Learn how to use Action Editor.
allTours.details:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar.

Learn how to:

Using the Action Editor,

  • Navigate between forms
  • Set if, else conditions
  • Show an alert
  • Set widget properties

allTours.title: Creating a Component
allTours.description: Learn how to create a component.
allTours.details:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar.

 Learn how to:

  • Create a login form
  • Create a layout for the component
  • Add data validations to widgets
  • Add the component to the login form

allTours.title: Understand App Channels
allTours.description: Explore a sample app designed for various application channels.
allTours.details:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar.

Learn about the following channels:

  • Mobile
  • Tablet
  • Desktop
  • Wearables

allTours.title: Introduction to Volt MX JavaScript
allTours.description: Understanding the basics of Volt MX JavaScript.
allTours.details:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar.

 Learn how to:

  • Use JavaScript to create a login form
  • Get insights on the validate and onNavigate functions

allTours.title: Introduction to Internationalization
allTours.description: Learn the basics of Internationalization(i18n).
allTours.details:
This learning module is a Volt MX Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Volt MX Iris that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Iris toolbar.

Learn how to:

  • Configure an app for different locales
  • View the locale changes for the app on a device

allTours.title: Internationalization with Layout
allTours.description: Learn the basics of Internationalization(i18n) with layout configuration changes.
allTours.details:
This learning module is a Volt MX Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Volt MX Iris that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Iris toolbar.

Learn how to:

  • Configure an app for different locales
  • View the locale and layout changes for the app on a device
